review:
I think dhoom 2 is the best one👍👍👍 of all dhoom series, because it has a superb👌👌👌 storyline, awesome script✍️✍️✍️✍️,numerous solid twists🔀🔀🔀🔀, stylish music🎶🎶🎶🎶, especially "Crazy Kiya Re"😜😜😜😜, and last but not the least "high octane actions👊👊👊 👊and stunts🔥🔥🔥🔥". Hrithik was really most talented soul❤️❤️❤️❤️ and star⭐⭐⭐⭐of the show of dhoom franchise, Aishwarya Rai was too superb🔥🔥🔥🔥 & Abhishek Bachchan & Uday Chopra were also amazing👏👏👏👏.

Full 🔟 stars 💫💫💫� ...MORE

I think dhoom 2 is the best one👍👍👍 of all dhoom series, because it has a superb👌👌👌 storyline, awesome script✍️✍️✍️✍️,numerous solid twists🔀🔀🔀🔀, stylish music🎶🎶🎶🎶, especially "Crazy Kiya Re"😜😜😜😜, and last but not the least "high octane actions👊👊👊 👊and stunts🔥🔥🔥🔥". Hrithik was really most talented soul❤️❤️❤️❤️ and star⭐⭐⭐⭐of the show of dhoom franchise, Aishwarya Rai was too superb🔥🔥🔥🔥 & Abhishek Bachchan & Uday Chopra were also amazing👏👏👏👏.

Full 🔟 stars 💫💫💫💫💫💫💫💫💫💫to the team and makers of dhoom 2.

💯% entertainer at its best👍🇮🇳👊👏💫

But dhoom 3 was not up to the mark as I expected to be better than dhoom 2.

Now, eagerly waiting for dhoom 4.I hope it up be better than dhoom 3.

Dhoom 2, probably the best Dhoom movie in the series. I remember that it was my second movie that I watched in theater. This movie is based on a whole different concept where Hrithik Roshan plays the role of Mr. A whose is a master of disguise. This is one of my favourite movie ever. And if you like Bollywood movies then it is a must watch movie. The plot of the story is great, the equipments were too ahead of the time, and the escape scene and the diamond robbery was the best part of the movie. ...MORE

Dhoom 2, probably the best Dhoom movie in the series. I remember that it was my second movie that I watched in theater. This movie is based on a whole different concept where Hrithik Roshan plays the role of Mr. A whose is a master of disguise. This is one of my favourite movie ever. And if you like Bollywood movies then it is a must watch movie. The plot of the story is great, the equipments were too ahead of the time, and the escape scene and the diamond robbery was the best part of the movie. The locations are great, the picture quality was awesome. And simply this movie was too good. I recommend all to watch the movie.

Dhoom 2 is like my dream film. After I watched it, I'am become the biggest fan for this film. Hrithik is stunning and charming. Abhishek is really good . Aishwarya rai performance is very nice.  Uday chopra is as usual given his best. His performance in humour sense is nice. Especially,  the  bank robbery  scene  is fantastic.  And  the 'dhoom machale ' song is rocking.  A fantastic  film . Everyone can watch this and enjoy this .

Amazing movie. One of my favourite movie too. Storyline direction was awesome. VFX quality were superb. Actors acting were real good. I have enjoyed this series but Dhoom 3 I didn't like it much because in Dhoom 1 2004 and this dhoom2 is far better because  stealing story was there . and in Dhoom 3 only entertaining cum stunt scene was there a lot that's why I didn't like this movie. But Dhoom 2 I led very much. Songs are  cool. Nice movie.
Hirithik roshan is the best thing in the film. Abishek and uday did a great job. Awesome time pass. Its one of the greatest masala entertainers of the last decade and we had so few of that time.
